title: FBI RAIDS CONTINUE: Pro-Life Activist Arrested
itunes:title: FBI RAIDS CONTINUE: Pro-Life Activist Arrested
description: Approximately 20 FBI agents raided the home of a pro-life activist on Friday. According to authorities, the activist violated the FACE Act while sidewalk counseling in October 2021. What's the FACE Act and what are the details surrounding this raid? Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team break it all down. This and more today on Sekulow.
content:encoded: Approximately 20 FBI agents raided the home of a pro-life activist on Friday. According to authorities, the activist violated the FACE Act while sidewalk counseling in October 2021. What's the FACE Act and what are the details surrounding this raid? Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team break it all down. This and more today on Sekulow.
